title: In PTL, Phreak should have a new section under League of Learning
body:
Called the **Phreak Show**

_(You know for all of those off-meta picks)_

replies.body:
I just want to watch Phreak play a game... he talks alot but I have never seen him play.

If he has some SOLOQ account I am not awareof plz let me know LoL....

I saw him streaming a few weeks ago but I don't know his actual account
Because of the puns of damage thing he's an ADC main but he's like Diamond 4 or something
He was at Diamond 3 the other day. He steams consistently (once or twice a week a weird times).
